name: TextInputAutocapitalization
desc: The kind of autocapitalization behavior applied during text input.

items.name: static var characters: TextInputAutocapitalization
items.desc: Defines an autocapitalizing behavior that will capitalize every letter.

items.name: static var sentences: TextInputAutocapitalization
items.desc: Defines an autocapitalizing behavior that will capitalize the first letter in every sentence.

items.name: static var words: TextInputAutocapitalization
items.desc: Defines an autocapitalizing behavior that will capitalize the first letter of every word.

items.name: static var never: TextInputAutocapitalization
items.desc: Defines an autocapitalizing behavior that will not capitalize anything.

items.name: init?(UITextAutocapitalizationType)
items.desc: Creates a new TextInputAutocapitalization struct from a UITextAutocapitalizationType enum.
